notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.B., M.N., and L.F.T. conceived and designed the study. L.F.T., J.A.R., L.M.C., and M.N. performed experiments and analyzed the data. M.N., L.M.C., and J.M.B. constructed phylogenetic trees. L.F.T. and J.A.R. drafted the manuscript. M.B. prepared the final version of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
